Detailed Description

A dictionary word definition.

Equality and Hashing

WNDefinition instances implement NSObject's hash and isEqual methods. Instances may be compared by value using NSObject::isEqual:.

Member Function Documentation

+ (id) definitionWithHeadWord: (NSString *)  headWord
text: (NSString *)  text
extendedText: (NSString *)  extendedText
partOfSpeech: (WNPartOfSpeech *)  partOfSpeech
citations: (NSArray *)  citations
labels: (NSArray *)  labels
dictionary: (WNDictionary*)  dictionary 

Create and initialize a new definition instance.

Parameters:
headWordHead word. This is the word that should serve as the heading for this definition's entry in the dictionary.
textThe definition text.
extendedTextThe optional extended definition text. If available, may be used in favor of the definition text in contexts where a longer, expanded definition is suitable.
partOfSpeechThis definition's part of speech
citationsThe ordered array of citations for this definition, as an array of WNDefinitionCitation instances.
labelsThe array of labels for this definition, as an array of WNDefinitionLabel instances.
- (id) initWithHeadWord: (NSString *)  headWord
text: (NSString *)  text
extendedText: (NSString *)  extendedText
partOfSpeech: (WNPartOfSpeech *)  partOfSpeech
citations: (NSArray *)  citations
labels: (NSArray *)  labels
dictionary: (WNDictionary*)  dictionary 

Initialize a new definition instance.

Parameters:
headWordHead word. This is the word that should serve as the heading for this definition's entry in the dictionary.
textThe definition text.
extendedTextThe optional extended definition text. If available, may be used in favor of the definition text in contexts where a longer, expanded definition is suitable.
partOfSpeechThis definition's part of speech
citationsThe ordered array of citations for this definition, as an array of WNDefinitionCitation instances.
labelsThe array of labels for this definition, as an array of WNDefinitionLabel instances.

Property Documentation

- (NSArray*) citations [read, assign]

The ordered array of citations for this definition, as an array of WNDefinitionCitation instances.

If no citations are available, this array will be empty.

- (WNDictionary*) dictionary [read, assign]

The source dictionary for this definition.

If not definied, this will be nil

- (NSString*) extendedText [read, assign]

The optional extended definition text.

If not nil, this property may be used in favor of the definition text in contexts where a longer, expanded definition is suitable.

- (NSString*) headWord [read, assign]

Head word.

This is the word that should serve as the heading for this definition's entry in the dictionary.

- (NSArray*) labels [read, assign]

The array of labels for this definition, as an array of WNDefinitionLabel instances.

If no labels are available, this array will be empty.

- (NSString*) text [read, assign]

The definition text.
